abstract: Is Warren Buffett mulling a move to sell down some of his holdings in BYD Company? The billionaire investor could deliver some tough talk when he visits the Chinese automaker next week, including potential plans to sell down his stake in the former high flyer, Reuters suggests.

lead_paragraph: Is Warren E. Buffett mulling a move to sell down some of his holdings in BYD Company?

headline.main: Buffett to Talk Tough to China’s BYD?
